name: Out of the Madness
description:
An endless runner type arcade game with a psychiatric hospital theme. Gameplay

Avoid the shadows of enemies to prevent being cought! 

Survive as long as possible!

Controls

WASD / ARROWS to Move

SHIFT to Use full power

ESC to Pause the game

Additional note

This is my first 2.5D project in unity that I have done. So my experience isn't too great.

 But hope you enjoy it!

Credits

Background music: "Wrong Rite Theme" by Pierre Bondoerffer (@pbondoer)

Font: "Kiwi Soda"  from fontenddev.com by "jeti"

Other sound effects: Open Game Art, Free Sound
